name: Trig
description:
Trig is a little quarantine project of mine, simply to prove to myself that I can make a game. 

I used the Godot Game Engine (not sponsored) to produce the game but went into development with my only real experience in programming, being developing console applications in C. 

The journey was bumpy, the code is messy and the sprites could be better but it works and I believe it is enjoyable, which is what matters most to me.

I'm not finished with development, there are still plenty of enemy types and bosses that I want to add as well as possibly other modes besides Normal and Hardcore.

Producing this game was a great experience for me and I hope you enjoy it as much as I enjoyed making it.

I am going to be uploading videos to my youtube channel, documenting the whole development process, mainly for me to look back on and see how I have improved, but if you want to stop by and check it out feel free.

Also please leave feedback, especially your view on its difficulty, there were some problems tweaking it to be challenging but also not frustrating.

P.S. It runs better as an EXE so I recommend that you download it, though I'm glad the browser version is functional as well.
